result.reason: Users want to execute scripts across multiple SSH connections, enhancing the Multi SSH functionality.
result.approach: Add a new 'MultiSshScript' string property to ConnectionInfo to store script content. Integrate UI elements in ConnectionWindow or a new dialog to allow input of this script. Implement logic to execute the stored script on all selected SSH connections during a Multi SSH session.
